    Address Book

    Create Address

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{"houseName":"Orange House","houseNumber":"119","street":"Colourful Street","townCity":"East Village","district":null,"state":null,"county":"Merseyside","postCode":"CH11 1GV","country":"United Kingdom","isDefault":true}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"houseName\":\"Orange House\",\"houseNumber\":\"119\",\"street\":\"Colourful Street\",\"townCity\":\"East Village\",\"district\":null,\"state\":null,\"county\":\"Merseyside\",\"postCode\":\"CH11 1GV\",\"country\":\"United Kingdom\",\"isDefault\":true}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"houseName\":\"Orange House\",\"houseNumber\":\"119\",\"street\":\"Colourful Street\",\"townCity\":\"East Village\",\"district\":null,\"state\":null,\"county\":\"Merseyside\",\"postCode\":\"CH11 1GV\",\"country\":\"United Kingdom\",\"isDefault\":true}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"houseName\":\"Orange House\",\"houseNumber\":\"119\",\"street\":\"Colourful Street\",\"townCity\":\"East Village\",\"district\":null,\"state\":null,\"county\":\"Merseyside\",\"postCode\":\"CH11 1GV\",\"country\":\"United Kingdom\",\"isDefault\":true}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"houseName\":\"Orange House\",\"houseNumber\":\"119\",\"street\":\"Colourful Street\",\"townCity\":\"East Village\",\"district\":null,\"state\":null,\"county\":\"Merseyside\",\"postCode\":\"CH11 1GV\",\"country\":\"United Kingdom\",\"isDefault\":true}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses",
  "method": "POST",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"houseName\":\"Orange House\",\"houseNumber\":\"119\",\"street\":\"Colourful Street\",\"townCity\":\"East Village\",\"district\":null,\"state\":null,\"county\":\"Merseyside\",\"postCode\":\"CH11 1GV\",\"country\":\"United Kingdom\",\"isDefault\":true}"
  }

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The resource created is returned in the Location header of the response

    This endpoint allows the creation of a new address within the eSuite platform for a specific account.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses

    POST Parameters
    houseName
    The name associated to the building    		 string Required
    houseNumber
    The building number associated to the address    		 string Required
    street
    The street the address is located    		 string Required
    townCity
    The town or city the address is associated    		 string Required
    district
    The district associated with the address    		 string
    state
    The state that the address is located    		 string
    county
    The county the address is associated    		 string
    postCode
    The postcode of the address that has been added    		 string Required
    country
    The country the address is specific to    		 string Required
    isDefault
    An indication as to whether the address is the default address for the account    		 bool

    *Either houseName or houseNumber is required but both are not Required.

    Retrieve Address Book

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionId" : "",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "addressBook": [
    {
      "addressIdentifier": "0010D04D2E807PQ953",
      "houseName": "Orange House",
      "houseNumber": "119",
      "street": "Colourful Street",
      "townCity": "East Village",
      "district": "",
      "state": "",
      "county": "Merseyside",
      "postCode": "CH11 1GV",
      "country": "United Kingdom",
      "isDefault": true
    }
  ]
}

    This endpoint allows the retrieval of all addresses that are stored against a specific account.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/addresses

    Response Parameters
    addressBook
    The list of addresses    		 array[object]
    addressIdentifier
    The address identifier that should be used to identify which address is required in future API requests    		 string
    houseName
    The name associated to the building    		 string
    houseNumber
    The building number associated to the address    		 string
    street
    The street the address is located    		 string
    townCity
    The town or city the address is associated    		 string
    district
    The district associated with the address    		 string
    state
    The state that the address is located    		 string
    county
    The county the address is associated    		 string
    postCode
    The postcode of the address that has been added    		 string
    country
    The country the address is specific to    		 string
    isDefault
    An indication as to whether the address is the default address for the account    		 bool

    Payment Details

    Add a Credit/Debit Card

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientpassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-clientid: 1001' \
  --data '{"cardNumber":"4111111111111111","cardType":"visa","expiryDate":"11/17","cvv":"123","setDefault":true,"skipPreAuth":false}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-clientid", "1001");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"cardType\":\"visa\",\"expiryDate\":\"11/17\",\"cvv\":\"123\",\"setDefault\":true,\"skipPreAuth\":false}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card")
  .header("x-clientid", "1001")
  .header("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"cardType\":\"visa\",\"expiryDate\":\"11/17\",\"cvv\":\"123\",\"setDefault\":true,\"skipPreAuth\":false}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["x-tokenid"] = '1001'
request["x-sessionid"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"cardType\":\"visa\",\"expiryDate\":\"11/17\",\"cvv\":\"123\",\"setDefault\":true,\"skipPreAuth\":false}"

response = http.request(request)

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"cardType\":\"visa\",\"expiryDate\":\"11/17\",\"cvv\":\"123\",\"setDefault\":true,\"skipPreAuth\":false}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-sessionid': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card",
  "method": "PUT",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "4034510a90854b1a887beec9c5675ff5",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"cardNumber\":\"4111111111111111\",\"cardType\":\"visa\",\"expiryDate\":\"11/17\",\"cvv\":\"123\",\"setDefault\":true,\"skipPreAuth\":false}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "paymentDetailId": "604DB6C40EAA4C04BC6E65C4E4135069"
}

    In order to make a purchase using a credit or debit card, a card must be added to the eSuite platform.

    URL End-point

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/card

    POST Parameters
    cardNumber
    The 13-19 digit number on the face of a credit or debit card.    		 string Required
    cardType
    The type of card the account is adding, Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Diners, Discover.    		 string Required
    expiryDate
    The date at which the card will expire, mm-yy.    		 string Required
    issueCode
    The number of cards the acquirer has issues for the account.    		 string
    securityCode
    3-4 digit code on the rear of a card.    		 string Required
    billingHouseName
    The building name in which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingHouseFlatNumber
    The building number at which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingStreet
    The street in which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingDistrict
    The district in which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingTownCity
    The town or city in which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingPostcode
    The post code in which the card is registered.    		 string
    billingCountry
    The country in which the card is registered.    		 string
    setDefault
    An indication as to whether this card will be the customers default card.    		 bool
    associatedName
    A friendly name to identify the payment card to the account.    		 string
    skipPreAuth
    An indication as to whether the card should be authorised as part of the addition process.    		 bool
    Remember you must authorise a card before it can be used

    Add a BACS Direct Debit Wallet

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientpassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-clientid: 1001' \
  --data '{"accountHolderName":"Steven Smith","accountNumber":"11111111","sortCode":"000000"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-sessionid", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-tokenid", "1001");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",  "\"accountNumber\":\"11111111\",\"sortCode\":\"000000\"}", 
  ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs")
  .header("x-tokenid", "1001")
  .header("x-sessionid", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"accountHolderName\":\"Steven Smith\",\"accountNumber\":\"11111111\",\"sortCode\":\"000000\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["x-tokenid"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-sessionid"] = '1001'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"accountNumber\":\"11111111\"}"

response = http.request(request)

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"accountNumber\":\"11111111\",\"sortCode\":\"000000\"}"

headers = {
    'x-clientpassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-clientid': "1001",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs",
  "method": "PUT",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "4034510a90854b1a887beec9c5675ff5",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"accountNumber\":\"11111111\",\"sortCode\":\"000000\"}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns an empty response alongside a HTTP 204

    In order to make a purchase using BACS Direct Debit, a BACS wallet must be added to the eSuite platform.

    URL End-point

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/bacs

    POST Parameters
    accountHolderName
    The name associated to the bank account.    		 string Required
    accountNumber
    The UK bank account number.    		 string Required
    sortCode
    The bank sort code associated to the account.    		 string Required
    bacsReference
    The existing mandate reference if the account is coming from another system.    		 string
    serviceId
    The eSuite ServiceId that this BACS wallet will be used for.    		 integer

    Add a SEPA Direct Debit Wallet

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/%7BaccountId%7D/payment-details/sepa \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientpassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-clientid: 1001' \
  --data '{"accountHolderName":"Steve Smith","iban":"IE64BOFI90583812345678",
  "bic":"BOFIIE2D"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/%7BaccountId%7D/payment-details/sepa");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-clientid", "1001");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"accountHolderName\":\"Steve Smith\", "\"iban\":\"IE64BOFI90583812345678\",\"bic\":\"BOFIIE2D\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/sepa")
  .header("x-clientid", "1001")
  .header("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"iban\":\"IE64BOFI90583812345678\",\"bic\":\"BOFIIE2D\")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/sepa")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientpassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"iban\":\"IE64BOFI90583812345678\",\"bic\":\"BOFIIE2D\"}"

response = http.request(request)

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"iban\":\"IE64BOFI90583812345678\",\"bic\":\"BOFIIE2D\"}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid': "1001",
    'x-clientpassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/sepa", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/sepa",
  "method": "PUT",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "4034510a90854b1a887beec9c5675ff5",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"accountHolderName\":\"John Smith\",\"iban\":\"IE64BOFI90583812345678\",\"bic\":\"BOFIIE2D\"}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns an empty response alongside a HTTP 204

    In order to make a purchase using SEPA Direct Debit, a SEPA wallet must be added to the eSuite platform.

    URL End-point

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details/sepa

    POST Parameters
    accountHolderName
    The name associated to the bank account.    		 string Required
    iban
    The bank account number.    		 string Required
    bic
    The bank identification code associated to the account.    		 string Required
    serviceId
    The eSuite ServiceId that this BACS wallet will be used for.    		 integer

    Get payment details

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details \
  --header("x-clientid", "1001") \
  --header("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")\
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-clientid", "1001");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details")
  .header("x-clientid", "1001")
  .header("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-tokenid"] = '1001'
request["x-sessionid"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-sessionid': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "paymentDetails": {
    "cards": [
      {
        "associatedName": "Joe Bloggs",
        "billingHouseName": "Joe",
        "billingHouseFlatNumber": "100",
        "billingStreet": "Wigan",
        "billingDistrict": "Manchester",
        "billingTownCity": "Bolton",
        "billingCounty": "Manchester",
        "billingPostcode": "111111",
        "billingCountry": "United Kindom",
        "cardNumber": "****-****-****-1111",
        "cardType": "visa",
        "expiryDate": "01/20",
        "isDefault": true,
        "issueCode": "123",
        "paymentDetailId": "604DB6C40EAA4C04BC6E65C4E4135069"
      }
    ],
    "payPal": {
      "paymentDetailId": "604DB6C40EAA4C04BC6E65C4E4135785"
    }
  }
}

    This endpoint retrieves the payment details stored against an eSuite account.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-details

    Response Parameters
    paymentDetails
    The collection of payment details available for the account.    		 array[object]
    cards
    The collection of payment cards available for the account.    		 array[object]
    cards \ associatedName
    Associated name to identify the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingHouseName
    The name of the house the card is associated to.    		 string
    cards \ billingHouseFlatNumber
    The number of the house the card is associated to.    		 string
    cards \ billingStreet
    The street associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingDistrict
    The district associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingTownCity
    The town or city associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingCounty
    The county associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingPostcode
    The postcode associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ billingCountry
    The country associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ cardNumber
    A masked representation of the card.    		 string
    cards \ cardType
    The card brand associated to the card.    		 string
    cards \ expiryDate
    The date at which the card is due to expire.    		 string
    cards \ isDefault
    An indication as to whether this card is the default for the account.    		 bool
    cards \ issueCode
    Issue number typically found on debit and bank cards.    		 string
    cards \ paymentDetailId
    The identifier of the card within eSuite.    		 string
    payPal
    PayPal object detailing information about the customers PayPal account.    		 object
    paymentDetailId
    The identifier of the PayPal wallet within eSuite.    		 string
    Only credit/debit cards and repeatable PayPal tokens are returned via this endpoint.

    Purchases

    Standard Subscription Purchase

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"pricing":{"priceId":18763,"paymentMethod":"CreditCard"}}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"pricing\":{\"priceId\":18763,\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\"}}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"pricing\":{\"priceId\":18763,\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\"}}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"pricing\":{\"priceId\":18763,\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"pricing\":{\"priceId\":18763,\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\"}}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "amountCharged": 10.00,
  "currency": "GBP",
  "paymentType": "DirectDebit",
  "subscriptionStatus": "Active",
  "renewalDay": 1,
  "renewalDayOffset": 0,
  "startDate": "2015-01-01T00:00:00",
  "renewalDate": "2017-01-01T00:00:00",
  "orderReference": 12548,
  "subscriptionId": 4555888,
  "subscriptionPriceId": 568845,
  "subscriptionReference": "458845",
  "resourceReference": "ResourceReference",
  "asynchronousProcessingParameters": null
}

    For the completion of standard payment options, making the following POST request will purchase the subscription service provided. A standard payment type is CreditCard DirectDebit, Service Credits or SEPA.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions

    Request Parameters
    voucherCode
    eSuite generated voucher code that has been provided during the flow    		 string
    cvv
    If the purchase is being made using an non-authorised card, this parameter can be passed in to enable authorisation to take place    		 string
    renewalDay
    The date of the month the subscription should be renewed on, specifically for monthly or annual subscriptions    		 integer
    renewalDayOffset
    The number of days before or after the renewal date. This can be positive or negative    		 string
    startDate
    The date at which the subscription should be purchased and started    		 string
    paymentMethod
    The type of payment method the account has selected. Standard methods are CreditCard DirectDebit, Service Credits or SEPA. Other methods are available    		 string
    entitlements
    A collection of additional entitlements to provide the account on purchase    		 array[object]
    entitlements \ identifier
    Identifier for the entitlement being purchased    		 string
    entitlements \ startDate
    The date on which the entitlement should be valid from    		 string
    entitlements \ expiryDate
    The date at which the account is no longer entitled to the content    		 string
    customOrderParameters
    A collection of custom attributes associated to the payment    		 dictionary
    customOrderParameters \ parameterName
    The custom attribute name    		 string
    customSubscriptionParameters
    A collection of custom attributes associated to the subscription    		 string
    customSubscriptionParameters \ parameterName
    The custom attribute name    		 string
    taxInfo
    Collection of tax information    		 object
    taxInfo \ zeroRated
    Indication as to whether the purchase is tax exempt    		 bool
    taxInfo \ country
    Country specific tax rate to use    		 string
    taxInfo \ state
    State specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ county
    County specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ city
    City specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    groupSubscriptionInfo
    Account Group information    		 string
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ groupToken
    The associated group account identifier    		 string
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ subscriberAccounts
    A collection of accounts that should be assigned to the subscription    		 array[object]
    subscriberAccounts \ clientUserId
    The clientUserId of the account that should be assigned    		 string
    subscriberAccounts \ emailAddress
    The email address of the account that should be assigned    		 string
    subscriberAccounts \ taxInfo
    Collection of tax information for each account    		 object
    taxInfo \ zeroRated
    Indication as to whether the purchase is tax exempt    		 string
    taxInfo \ country
    Country specific tax rate to use    		 string
    taxInfo \ state
    State specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ county
    County specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ city
    City specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    asynchronousInitiationParameters
    Parameter set provided if you would like to trigger an advanced payment type    		 object
    asynchronousInitiationParameters \ parameterName
    Parameter name specific to the alternative payment method provided    		 string

    Standard Credits Purchase

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"paymentMethod":"CreditDebitCard","currency":"GBP","paidCredits":10.12,"freeCredits":10.99}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
equest.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditDebitCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\",\"paidCredits\":10.12,\"freeCredits\":10.99}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditDebitCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\",\"paidCredits\":10.12,\"freeCredits\":10.99}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditDebitCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\",\"paidCredits\":10.12,\"freeCredits\":10.99}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditDebitCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\",\"paidCredits\":10.12,\"freeCredits\":10.99}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "orderId": "123456",
  "asynchronousProcessingParameters": {
    "redirectL:ink": "https://my-payments.com/?token=12345"
  }

    For the completion of standard payment options, making the following POST request will purchase the service credits. A standard payment type is CreditCard DirectDebit, Service Credits or SEPA.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits

    POST Parameters
    paymentMethod
    The payment method the account has selected to pay with if it differs from the initial configuration. The supported payment method for this endpoint is CreditCard only.    		 string
    cvv
    Security code of a card if the payment method is set to creditDebitCard    		 string
    voucherCode
    A voucher code provided by the account during the workflow    		 string
    paidCredits
    The amount of credits the account is purchasing    		 number
    freeCredits
    The amount of credits the account will receive without charge    		 number
    asynchronousInitiationParameters
    Parameter set provided if you would like to trigger an advanced payment type    		 object
    asynchronousInitiationParameters \ parameterName
    Parameter name specific to the alternative payment method provided    		 string

    Alternative Subscription Purchase

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscription \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{"asynchronousProcessingParameters":{"paymentToken":"ASWDE345YGT"}}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscription");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.PATCH);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscription")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscription")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscription", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "amountCharged": 10.00,
  "currency": "GBP",
  "paymentType": "DirectDebit",
  "subscriptionStatus": "Active",
  "renewalDay": 1,
  "renewalDayOffset": 0,
  "startDate": "2015-01-01T00:00:00",
  "renewalDate": "2017-01-01T00:00:00",
  "orderReference": 12548,
  "subscriptionId": 4555888,
  "subscriptionPriceId": 568845,
  "subscriptionReference": "458845",
  "resourceReference": "ResourceReference",
  "asynchronousProcessingParameters": null
}

    For the completion of alternative subscription options, making the following PATCH request will purchase the subscription service configured within the initial configuration request. A alternative payment type is PayPal Alipay, and any other which requires a redirect.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions

    Request Parameters
    asynchronousProcessingParameters
    Parameter set provided if you would like to complete an advanced payment type    		 string
    asynchronousProcessingParameters \ parameterName
    Parameter name specific to the alternative payment method provided    		 string

    Alternative Credits Purchase

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{"asynchronousProcessingParameters":{"paymentToken":"ASWDE345YGT"}}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.PATCH);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"asynchronousProcessingParameters\":{\"paymentToken\":\"ASWDE345YGT\"}}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits", payload, headers)

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
      "orderId": 154874,
      "asynchronousProcessingParameters": null
}

    For the completion of alternative credits purchase, making the following PATCH request will purchase the subscription service configured within the initial configuration request. A alternative payment type is PayPal Alipay, and any other which requires a redirect.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/service-credits

    Request Parameters
    asynchronousProcessingParameters
    Parameter set provided if you would like to complete an advanced payment type    		 string
    asynchronousProcessingParameters \ parameterName
    Parameter name specific to the alternative payment method provided    		 string

    Validate a voucher code

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'x-sessionId: a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-sessionId", "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d")
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("x-sessionId", "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["x-sessionid"] = 'a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': 'Str0ngP@ssword',
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'x-sessionid' : 'a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/support-logs/{supportLogReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured as below. Please note the API will only return the offer type object applicable to the voucher provided.

    {
  "purchaseInfo": {
    "purchasePrice": 0,
    "discountPrice": 0,
    "renewalPrice": 0,
    "nextPaymentsDates": [
      "2017-09-09T00:21:42.810Z"
    ]
  },
  "voucherInfo": {
    "startDate": "2017-09-09T00:21:42.810Z",
    "expiryDate": "2017-09-09T00:21:42.810Z",
    "offerInfo": {
      "name": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "usageType": 0,
      "applicationData": {
        "name": "string",

          }

          "enabled": true,

          "productIds": [

        }

}

    This endpoint will allow the validation of a voucher against a specific purchase.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/vouchers/{voucherCode}/validate

    Response Parameters
    purchaseInfo
    Collection of all information relating to the offer    		 object
    purchaseInfo \ purchasePrice
    The default price that would be paid without a voucher    		 decimal
    purchaseInfo \ discountPrice
    The price that will be paid by using a voucher    		 decimal
    purchaseInfo \ renewalPrice
    The price that will be paid when the subscription renews (if purchasing a subscription)    		 decimal
    purchaseInfo \ nextPaymentDates
    The date at which payment will be taken (only applicable to legacy payment schedules)    		 string
    voucherInfo
    Information relating the the general detail associated to the offer    		 object
    voucherInfo \ startDate
    The date at which the offer becomes active    		 string
    voucherInfo \ expiryDate
    The date at which the offer becomes inactive    		 string
    voucherInfo \ offerInfo
    The date at which the offer becomes inactive    		 object
    offerInfo \ name
    The name associated to the offer    		 string
    offerInfo \ description
    Additional details against the offer    		 string
    offerInfo \ usageType
    The type of usage applicable for the offer    		 string
    offerInfo \ applicationData
    Alternative data to display to an end-user    		 array[objects]
    applicationData \ name
    End-user name    		 string
    applicationData \ message
    Public facing message    		 string
    applicationData \ message2
    Additional public facing message    		 string
    voucherInfo \ addCredits
    Information relating to an Add Credits offer type    		 array[objects]
    addCredits \ amount
    Amount of credit the account should receive    		 decimal
    addCredits \ currency
    Currency the credit should be added in    		 string
    addCredits \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    voucherInfo \ lowStart
    Information relating to an Low Start offer type    		 array[objects]
    lowStart \ percentage
    The percentage discount the account should receive    		 decimal
    lowStart \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    lowStart \ lockInPeriods
    Number of periods before the account can cancel their subscription    		 integer
    lowStart \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    lowStart \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    lowStart \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    voucherInfo \ percentageDiscount
    Information relating to an Percentage Discount offer type    		 array[objects]
    percentageDiscount \ percentage
    The percentage discount that will be received    		 decimal
    percentageDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    voucherInfo \ freePeriod
    Information relating to an free Period offer type    		 array[objects]
    freePeriod \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    freePeriod \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    freePeriod \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    voucherInfo \ groupDiscount
    Information relating to a Group Discount offer type    		 array[objects]
    groupDiscount \ metaData
    Metadata of the group discount    		 object
    metaData \ qualifyingItemCount
    The number of items that must be purchased to be applicable for the offer    		 integer
    metaData \ freeItemCountOrDiscountAmount
    The discount amount or the number of free items    		 integer
    metaData \ productIds
    List of Products that can have the offer redeemed    		 array[integer]
    groupDiscount \ productSource
    Product source    		 string
    groupDiscount \ customParameters
    Dictionary of custom parameters applicable to the discount    		 dictionary
    voucherInfo \ fixedPriceDiscount
    Information relating to a Fixed Price Discount offer type    		 array[objects]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    fixedPriceDiscount \ discountAmounts
    Specific currency configuration    		 array[objects]
    discountAmounts \ value
    Amount to be discounted    		 decimal
    discountAmounts \ currency
    The associated currency    		 string
    fixedPriceDiscount \ subscriptionSettings
    Settings associated to the service aspect of a fixed price discount    		 array[objects]
    subscriptionSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a subscription purchase    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ numberOfPeriods
    Number of renewing periods the offer is applicable for    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ lockInPeriods
    The number of periods an account would be locked in if the offer was redeemed    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ productSettings
    Product specific settings for the offer    		 array[objects]
    productSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a product purchase    		 bool
    productSettings \ productIds
    Collection of products that can benefit from the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ miscellaneousChargeSettings
    Details specific to one-off charge    		 object
    miscellaneousChargeSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a one-off charge    		 bool

    Subscription Management

    Retrieve all Subscriptions

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "subscriptions": [
    {
      "accountSubscriptionInfo": {
        "expiryDate": "2017-08-23T14:19:10.817",
        "firstNonDiscountedBillingPointUtc": "0001-01-01T00:00:00",
        "lastDiscountedBillingPointUtc": "0001-01-01T00:00:00",
        "paymentMethod": "CreditDebitCard",
        "recurringPaymentInfo": {
          "subscriptionReference": 317337,
          "resourceReference": "0010SRA891LP0HW231",
          "configuredSubscriptionPrice": 18665,
          "subscribedPrice": 200,
          "currency": "EUR",
          "recurringPaymentEnable": true,
          "subscriptionLockedIn": false,
          "nextPaymentDate": "2017-08-23T14:19:10.817",
          "previousBillingInfo": {
            "subscriptionPriceId": 18665,
            "totalAmount": 180,
            "totalTaxAmount": 150,
            "totalNetAmount": 150,
            "billingDate": "2017-07-23T14:19:15.27",
            "paymentDate": "2017-08-23T14:19:10.817",

              {
                "regionName": "GBR",
                "regionType": "Country",
                "displayName": "United Kingdom",
                "category": "Standard",
                "rate": 20,
                "amount": 30
              }
            ]
          },
          "groupSubscriptionInfo": {
            "licenseLevel": 10,
            "overflowLevel": 0,
            "overFlowCount": 0,
            "fullSubscriptionsCount": 2,
            "currentUserInOverFlow": false,
            "accountGroupToken": "40271c08-0f7cf1b37d28"
          },
          "voucherCodes": {
            "discountPrice": 0
          },
          "statusInfo": {
            "statusId": 2,
            "statusDescription": "Active"
          },
          "customParameters": {}
        }
      },
      "defaultSubscriptionInfo": {
        "customParameters": {},
        "subscriptionId": 15991,
        "subscriptionStatus": "active",
        "subscriptionTitle": "Account Group Sub",
        "subscriptionGroup": "AGT",
        "licenseLevel": 10
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Calling this endpoint will return the history of all subscriptions an account has or has previously had.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions

    Response Parameters
    subscriptions
    Collection of all subscription an account has purchased    		 array[object]
    subscriptions \ accountSubscriptionInfo
    Collection of subscriptions    		 object
    accountSubscriptionInfo \ expiryDate
    The date at which the subscription expired or will renew    		 string
    accountSubscriptionInfo \ firstNonDiscountedBillingPointUtc
    The first date the account paid full price for the subscription    		 string
    accountSubscriptionInfo \ lastDiscountedBillingPointUtc
    The last date the account received a discount    		 string
    accountSubscriptionInfo \ paymentMethod
    Payment method used for the subscription    		 string
    accountSubscriptionInfo \ recurringPaymentInfo
    Specific information around the subscription recurrence    		 object
    recurringPaymentInfo \ subscriptionReference
    Subscription Identifier    		 integer
    recurringPaymentInfo \ configuredSubscriptionPrice
    Default Price of the subscription service    		 number
    recurringPaymentInfo \ subscribedPrice
    Price of subscription at the point of subscribing    		 number
    recurringPaymentInfo \ currency
    The currency the subscription is related    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ recurringPaymentEnable
    An indication whether the subscription will renew    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ subscriptionLockedIn
    An indication whether the subscription can be cancelled    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ nextPaymentDate
    Date at which the next payment will be taken    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ previousBillingInfo
    Information relating to the previous payment made    		 object
    previousBillingInfo \ subscriptionPriceId
    Previous price identifier used    		 integer
    previousBillingInfo \ totalAmount
    Total amount paid by the account    		 number
    previousBillingInfo \ totalTaxAmount
    Total tax amount paid by the account    		 number
    previousBillingInfo \ totalNetAmount
    Total net amount paid by the account    		 number
    previousBillingInfo \ billingDate
    The date the account was last billed    		 string
    previousBillingInfo \ paymentDate
    The date the account was debited    		 string
    previousBillingInfo \ taxInfo
    Collection of tax rates applied    		 array[object]
    taxInfo \ regionName
    Name of the tax region    		 string
    taxInfo \ regionType
    The type of region the tax related    		 string
    taxInfo \ displayName
    Friendly name of the tax applied    		 string
    taxInfo \ category
    The category of tax applied    		 string
    taxInfo \ rate
    The tax rate applied    		 number
    taxInfo \ amount
    The amount of tax calculated    		 number
    previousBillingInfo \ priceItems
    Collection of items provided for a dynamic priced subscription    		 array[object]
    priceItems \ thirdPartyRef
    An external referenced provided    		 string
    priceItems \ supplierId
    An internal supplierId if applicable    		 integer
    priceItems \ price
    The price to charge    		 number
    priceItems \ description
    The description related to the charge    		 string
    priceItems \ isGrossAmount
    An indication whether the price should be charged as gross or net    		 string
    priceItems \ taxCategoryName
    The category of tax that was applied    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ groupSubscriptionInfo
    Information related to a group subscription    		 object
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ licenseLevel
    The number of standard licenses the subscription has    		 integer
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ overflowLevel
    The number of overflow licenses the subscription has    		 integer
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ subscriberList
    Collection of all associated subscribers    		 array[object]
    subscriberList \ subscriptionId
    The unique identifier to the subscription for the account    		 integer
    subscriberList \ emailAddress
    The email address of the subscribed account    		 string
    subscriberList \ clientUserId
    The clientUserId of the subscribed account    		 string
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ overFlowCount
    The number of overflow licenses used    		 integer
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ fullSubscriptionsCount
    The number of standard licenses used    		 integer
    groupSubscriptionInfo \ currentUserInOverFlow
    Indication whether the account is deemed overflow    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ voucherCodes
    Voucher information associated to the subscription    		 object
    voucherCodes \ voucherCode
    The current voucher code against the subscription    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ voucherCodes > discountPrice
    The price charged to the customer as a result of the voucher    		 number
    recurringPaymentInfo \ statusInfo
    Information relating to subscription status    		 object
    statusInfo \ statusId
    The status identifier for the subscription    		 integer
    statusInfo \ statusDescription
    Description of the subscriptions status    		 string
    recurringPaymentInfo \ customParameters
    Custom parameters of the accounts subscription    		 object
    customParameters \ ParameterName
    Custom parameters of the accounts subscription    		 string
    subscriptions \ defaultSubscriptionInfo
    Collection of information relating to the overall subscription service    		 object
    defaultSubscriptionInfo \ customParameters
    The associated subscription service parameters    		 object
    defaultSubscriptionInfo \ subscriptionId
    Subscription Service Identifier    		 integer
    defaultSubscriptionInfo \ subscriptionStatus
    The status of the subscription service    		 string
    defaultSubscriptionInfo \ subscriptionTitle
    The title of the subscription service purchase    		 string
    defaultSubscriptionInfo \ subscriptionGroup
    The group the subscription service belongs    		 string

    Cancel a Subscription

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{"status":"cancel"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.patch);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"status\":\"replace\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"status\":\"cancel\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"status\":\"cancel\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"status\":\"cancel\"}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}",
  "method": "PATCH",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"status\":\"cancel\"}]"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204

    Calling this endpoint will allow you to hard cancel a subscription. The successful execution of this call will remove all associated entitlements.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}

    Patch Parameters
    status
    Passing cancel will cancel the subscription and remove entitlements    		 string

    Manage Subscription renewals

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{"renewals":"enable"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.patch);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"renewals\":\"enable\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"renewals\":\"enable\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"renewals\":\"enable\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client
