payload = "{\"renewals\":\"enable\"}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status",
  "method": "PATCH",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"renewals\":\"enable\"}]"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204

    Calling this endpoint will allow you to enable or disable the renewal process for a specific subscription. The available values to be set are enable and disable

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/status

    Patch Parameters
    renewals
    Passing enable to activate renewals, and disable to deactivate.    		 string

    Add a Voucher Code

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"voucherCode":"ABC45FDR"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"voucherCode\":\"ABC45FDR\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"voucherCode\":\"ABC45FDR\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"voucherCode\":\"ABC45FDR\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"voucherCode\":\"ABC45FDR\"}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/vouchers",
  "method": "POST",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"voucherCode\":\"ABC45FDR\"}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204:

    Calling this endpoint will allow you to add a voucher code to an existing subscription that will be applied at the next renewal.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionid}/vouchers

    POST Parameters
    voucherCode
    Preconfigured eSuite voucher code    		 string Required

    Create a holiday

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"startDate":"2017-07-04T00:00:00","endDate":"2017-07-14T23:59:59"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"startDate\":\"2017-07-04T00:00:00\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-14T23:59:59\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"startDate\":\"2017-07-04T00:00:00\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-14T23:59:59\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"startDate\":\"2017-07-04T00:00:00\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-14T23:59:59\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"startDate\":\"2017-07-04T00:00:00\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-14T23:59:59\"}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays",
  "method": "POST",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{\"startDate\":\"2017-07-04T00:00:00\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-14T23:59:59\"}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 200 with JSON similar to the below.

    {
  "subscriptionHolidayReference": "QIUQIEUQIEU8173",
  "subscriptionReference": "ASJDKAS6712KDASK",
  "startDate": "2017-07-04T00:00:00",
  "endDate": "2017-07-14T23:59:59"
}

    This endpoint allows you to create a holiday period for a specific subscription.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays

    Request Parameters
    startDate
    The date at which the holiday period should begin.    		 string Required
    endDate
    The date at which the subscription should become active.    		 string Required

    Retrieve a holiday

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference} \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "subscriptionHolidayReference": "QIUQIEUQIEU8173",
  "subscriptionReference": "ASJDKAS6712KDASK",
  "startDate": "2017-07-04T00:00:00",
  "endDate": "2017-07-14T23:59:59"
}

    This endpoint allows you to retrieve all configured subscription holidays for a specific accounts subscription.

    URL Endpoint

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/

    Response Parameters
    subscriptionHolidayReference
    Reference to the holiday.    		 string
    subscriptionReference
    Reference to the subscription.    		 string
    startDate
    The date at which the holiday period should begin.    		 string
    endDate
    The date at which the subscription should become active.    		 string

    Update a holiday

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
 --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/StartDate/","value":"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z"},{"op":"replace","path":"/EndDate/","value":"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z"}]'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.PATCH);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/StartDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z\"},{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/EndDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z\"}]", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/StartDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z\"},{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/EndDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z\"}]")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/StartDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z\"},{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/EndDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/StartDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z\"},{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/EndDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z\"}]"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}",
  "method": "PATCH",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/StartDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-08-04 00:00:00Z\"},{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/EndDate/\",\"value\":\"2017-09-04 00:00:00Z\"}]"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "subscriptionHolidayReference": "QIUQIEUQIEU8173",
  "subscriptionReference": "ASJDKAS6712KDASK",
  "startDate": "2017-07-04T00:00:00",
  "endDate": "2017-07-14T23:59:59"
}

    In the event you need to update a subscription holiday, this end point should be called to edit those which have not started.

    URL Endpoint

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}

    PATCH Parameters
    A collection of updates that should be made to the resource array[objects] Required
    op
    The type of change that should be executed. add, replace and remove are available operations.    		 string Required
    path
    The name of the parameter that should be updated.    		 string Required
    value
    The new value to store against the parameter.    		 string Required

    Delete a holiday

    curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference} \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.DELETE);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'

request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("DELETE", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}",
  "method": "DELETE",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204 upon completion.

    If an account would like to cancel their subscription holiday, this endpoint should be called.

    URL Endpoint

    DELETE https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/{subscriptionHolidayReference}

    Retrieve all subscription holidays

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

puts response.read_body

    import http.client

    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    [{
  "subscriptionHolidayReference": "QIUQIEUQIEU8173",
  "subscriptionReference": "ASJDKAS6712KDASK",
  "startDate": "2017-07-04T00:00:00",
  "endDate": "2017-07-14T23:59:59"
}]

    This endpoint allows you to retrieve all configured subscription holidays for a specific accounts subscription.

    URL Endpoint

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/subscriptions/{subscriptionReference}/holidays/

    Response Parameters
    The collection of subscription holidays. array[objects]
    subscriptionHolidayReference
    Reference to the holiday.    		 string
    subscriptionReference
    Reference to the subscription.    		 string
    startDate
    The date at which the holiday period should begin.    		 string
    endDate
    The date at which the subscription should become active.    		 string

    Payment Management

    Make a Payment

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"pricing":{"paymentMethod":"CreditCard","currency":"GBP"},"orderItems":[{"priceBreakDown":{"grossAmount":10,"netAmount":9,"taxAmount":1},"description":"An example description"}]}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"pricing\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"orderItems\":[{\"priceBreakDown\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":9,\"taxAmount\":1},\"description\":\"An example description\"}]}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"pricing\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"orderItems\":[{\"priceBreakDown\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":9,\"taxAmount\":1},\"description\":\"An example description\"}]}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"pricing\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"orderItems\":[{\"priceBreakDown\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":9,\"taxAmount\":1},\"description\":\"An example description\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"pricing\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"orderItems\":[{\"priceBreakDown\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":9,\"taxAmount\":1},\"description\":\"An example description\"}]}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
    "basketNumber": "433M16125900",
    "orders": [
        {
            "orderId": 16125900
        }
    ]
}

    This end point is present for server-side integrations to take a payment against an account for a set of ad-hoc items.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders

    POST Parameters
    settlementType
    An indication whether to complete immediately or at a later date. Pending or NextAvailable are the available values    		 string
    pricing
    Pricing Information object    		 object
    pricing \ paymentMethod
    The payment method the account would like to pay using. The available payment methods for this endpoint are: CreditCard, PayPal, ServiceCredits, Alipay and Offline.    		 string
    pricing \ currency
    The currency the payment should be taken in    		 string
    voucherCode
    eSuite generated voucher code that has been provided during the flow    		 string
    cvv
    If the purchase is being made using an non-authorised card, this parameter can be passed in to enable authorisation to take place    		 string
    orderItems
    A collection of items that the account is attempting to purchase    		 array[object] Required
    orderItems \ description
    The description associated to the item    		 string Required
    orderItems \ orderReference
    An external reference that can be associated to each item    		 string
    orderItems \ comment
    Additional metadata that may have been provided    		 string
    orderItems \ priceBreakdown
    The details relating to the amount the account should pay for the item    		 object Required
    priceBreakdown \ grossAmount
    The gross amount for the item    		 decimal Required
    priceBreakdown \ netAmount
    The total amount minue the associated tax amount    		 decimal
    priceBreakdown \ taxAmount
    The amount of tax that must be paid on the item    		 decimal
    orderItems \ customOrderParameters
    A collection of custom attributes associated to the payment    		 dictionary
    customOrderParameters \ parameterName
    The custom attribute name    		 string
    orderItems \ entitlements
    A collection of additional entitlements to provide the account on purchase    		 array[object]
    entitlements \ identifier
    Identifier for the entitlement being purchased    		 string
    entitlements \ startDate
    The date on which the entitlement should be valid from    		 string
    entitlements \ expiryDate
    The date at which the account is no longer entitled to the content    		 string
    orderItems \ taxInfo
    Collection of tax information    		 object Required
    taxInfo \ category
    Indication as to which tax category to apply    		 string
    taxInfo \ zeroRated
    Indication as to whether the purchase is tax exempt    		 bool
    taxInfo \ country
    Country specific tax rate to use    		 string
    taxInfo \ state
    State specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ county
    County specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    taxInfo \ city
    City specific tax rate to use (US Specific)    		 string
    asynchronousProcessingParameters
    Asynchronous Processing Parameters    		 object

    Retrieve Payments

    curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1", payload, headers)

data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders?createDateFrom=2010-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&createDateTo=2017-07-06T09:06:28.640Z&rowsPerPage=10&currentPage=1",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "totalNumberOfRecords": 1,
  "pageNumber": 1,
  "resultsPerPage": 10,
  "items": [
    {
      "basketId": "433M154875",
      "subscriptionId": 154874,
      "currency": "GBP",
      "orders": [
        {
          "orderId": 15487,
          "orderStatus": "Complete",
          "orderDate": "2018-02-09T12:17:30.149Z",
          "description": "string",
          "priceBreakDown": {
            "grossAmount": 10,
            "netAmount": 8,
            "taxAmount": 2,
            "taxBreakDown": [
              {
                "displayName": "Standard UK",
                "regionName": "Standard",
                "regionType": "Country",
                "category": "Standard",
                "rate": 20,
                "amount": 2.00
              }
            ]
          },
          "paymentMethod": "CreditCard",
          "customParameters": {
              "colour" : "red"
          }
        }
      ]}
  ]

    This endpoint allows you to retrieve all orders for a given account.

    URL Endpoint

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/orders

    Query Parameters
    createDateFrom
    The earliest date a payment was taken that can be included in the response    		 string Required
    createDateTo
    The latest date a payment was taken that can be included in the response    		 string Required
    rowsPerPage
    An indication as to how many records to return    		 string Required
    currentPage
    The page that should be returned    		 string Required

    Response Parameters
    totalNumberOfRecords
    Total number of records available    		 string
    pageNumber
    The page of results being displayed    		 string
    resultsPerPage
    The total number of records displayed in the response    		 string
    items
    Collection of orders associated to the account    		 object
    items \ basketId
    The basket reference that groups the transactions together    		 string
    items \ subscriptionId
    The identifier of the subscription, if the transaction is associated    		 string
    items \ currency
    The ISO code for the currency used to make the purchase    		 string
    items \ orders
    The collection of attributes associated to each transaction    		 object
    orders \ orderId
    The unique value associated to the order for identification    		 string
    orders \ orderStatus
    The status the order is currently in    		 string
    orders \ orderDate
    The date at which the order was placed    		 string
    orders \ description
    A summary of what the order was placed for    		 string
    orders \ paymentMethod
    The method of payment that has been used to process the order    		 string
    orders \ priceBreakdown
    Object relating to the amounts charged to the account    		 object
    priceBreakdown \ grossAmount
    The total amount paid by the customer for the specific payment    		 decimal
    priceBreakdown \ netAmount
    The gross amount minus the amount of tax paid    		 decimal
    priceBreakdown \ taxAmount
    The amount of tax associated to the payment    		 decimal
    priceBreakdown \ taxBreakdown
    The detailed breakdown of the tax associated to the transaction    		 array[object]
    taxBreakdown \ displayName
    The friendly name of the tax region    		 string
    taxBreakdown \ regionName
    The name associated to the tax region    		 string
    taxBreakdown \ regionType
    The region type of the tax amount. Available options are country, county, state and city    		 string
    taxBreakdown \ category
    The cateory of tax that the transaction is associated    		 string
    taxBreakdown \ rate
    The rate of tax that has been applied to the order    		 decimal
    taxBreakdown \ amount
    The amount of money that is applicable as tax    		 string
    items \ customPaymentParameters
    A collection of custom attributes associated to the payment    		 dictionary
    customPaymentParameters \ parameterName
    The name of the custom attribute    		 string

    Update a Payment

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/status","value":"pending"}]'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.PATCH);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/status\",\"value\":\"pending\"}]", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/status\",\"value\":\"pending\"}]")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/status\",\"value\":\"pending\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/status\",\"value\":\"pending\"}]"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}//api/payments/{paymentReference}",
  "method": "PUT",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/status\",\"value\":\"pending\"}]"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204.

    This endpoint allows you to edit parameters of the payment that has been returned in the GET request (including custom parameters).

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/payments/{paymentReferene}

    PATCH Parameters
    A collection of updates that should be made to the resource array[objects] Required
    op
    The type of change that should be executed. add, replace and remove are available operations.    		 string Required
    path
    The name of the parameter that should be updated.    		 string Required
    value
    The new value to store against the parameter.    		 string Required

    Refund a Payment

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/payments/{paymentReference}/refund \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
--data '{"amount":20,"triggerBackOfficeEmail":true,"reason":"Customer has returned their goods.","reasonCode":"0012B","refundAsServiceCredits":true,"serviceCreditExpiry":"2018-07-05"}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/payments/{paymentReference}/refund");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"amount\":20,\"triggerBackOfficeEmail\":true,\"reason\":\"Customer has returned their goods.\",\"reasonCode\":\"0012B\",\"refundAsServiceCredits\":true,\"serviceCreditExpiry\":\"2018-07-05\"}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/payments/{paymentReference}/refund")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"amount\":20,\"triggerBackOfficeEmail\":true,\"reason\":\"Customer has returned their goods.\",\"reasonCode\":\"0012B\",\"refundAsServiceCredits\":true,\"serviceCreditExpiry\":\"2018-07-05\"}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/payments/{paymentReference}/refund")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"amount\":20,\"triggerBackOfficeEmail\":true,\"reason\":\"Customer has returned their goods.\",\"reasonCode\":\"0012B\",\"refundAsServiceCredits\":true,\"serviceCreditExpiry\":\"2018-07-05\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"amount\":20,\"triggerBackOfficeEmail\":true,\"reason\":\"Customer has returned their goods.\",\"reasonCode\":\"0012B\",\"refundAsServiceCredits\":true,\"serviceCreditExpiry\":\"2018-07-05\"}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/payments/{paymentReference}/refund", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    Not available from a client-side application

    The above command returns a HTTP 204 with a location header of the new payment reference created:

    Calling this endpoint will allow the refund of a previously processed order. This endpoint cannot be called for orders that have been imported and processed via a different provider.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/orders/{orderId}/refund

    POST Parameters
    amount
    The amount of money that should be refunded to the account.    		 decimal Required
    triggerBackOfficeEmail
    An indication as to whether a back office system should be notified.    		 bool
    reason
    Additional information as to why the refund is being performed    		 string
    reasonCode
    A code specific to your business for refund types    		 string
    refundAsServiceCredits
    Define whether you would like the refund to be executed against the originating payment method or as a credit on the account.    		 bool
    serviceCreditExpiry
    The date at which the service credits would expire.    		 string

    Carts

    Create a Cart

    curl --request POST \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/carts", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts",
  "method": "POST",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    In order to add items to a cart, the cart must first be created by executing a request to this endpoint.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts

    Retrieve a Cart

    curl --request GET \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference} \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
--data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'

    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

  "crossDomain": true,

  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    [
    {
        "resourceReference": "0010IP4Y47M3256M51",
        "description": "item description",
        "pricing": {
            "grossAmount": 10.00,
            "netAmount": 8.00,
            "taxAmount": 2.00,
            "currency": "EUR"
        },
        "quantity": 1,
        "productInfo": {},
        "customLineItemParameters": {}
    }
]

    This endpoint allows the retrieval of a specific cart that has been created on the eSuite platform.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}

    Response Parameters
    lineItemReference
    Line Item Reference    		 string
    description
    Description of the line item    		 string
    pricing
    Collection of information regarding pricing    		 object
    pricing \ grossAmount
    The gross amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ netAmount
    The net amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ taxAmount
    The tax amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ currency
    Currency of the transaction    		 string
    quantity
    Number of the line item being purchased    		 integer
    productInfo
    Collection of Product information    		 object
    productInfo > productId
    The pre-configured product identifier    		 integer
    customLineItemParameters
    Collection of custom line item parameters    		 dictionary
    customLineItemParameters \ parameterName
    Name associated to the custom parameter    		 string

    Update a Cart

    curl --request PATCH \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference} \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
--data '[{"op":"add","path":"/accountReference","value":"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2"}]'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.PATCH);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "[{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/accountReference\",\"value\":\"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2\"}]", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/accountReference\",\"value\":\"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2\"}]")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/accountReference\",\"value\":\"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/accountReference\",\"value\":\"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2\"}]"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/carts/{cartReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}",
  "method": "PATCH",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/accountReference\",\"value\":\"0010X2Y7GLHZ0Y1JH2\"}]" 
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    An existing cart can be edited by calling the following endpoint. An example where this would be required is when associating a cart to a specific eSuite account.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartResourceReference}

    PATCH Parameters
    A collection of updates that should be made to the resource array[objects] Required
    op
    The type of change that should be executed. add, replace and remove are available operations.    		 string Required
    path
    The name of the parameter that should be updated.    		 string Required
    value
    The new value to store against the parameter.    		 string Required

    Delete a Cart

    curl --request DELETE \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference} \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
--data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.DELETE);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.delete("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    In order to remove a cart from the eSuite, this endpoint must be called. If the cart is associated to an previous payment, it is deemed immutable and cannot be removed.

    HTTP Request

    DELETE https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartResourceReference}

    Create a Line-item

    curl --request POST \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference/line-items \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--header 'content-type: application/json' \
--data '{"description":"Example line item","pricing":{"grossAmount":10,"netAmount":8,"taxAmount":2,"currency":"GBP"},"quantity":1}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference/line-items");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"description\":\"Example line item\",\"pricing\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":8,\"taxAmount\":2,\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"quantity\":1}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference/line-items")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"description\":\"Example line item\",\"pricing\":{\"grossAmount\":10,\"netAmount\":8,\"taxAmount\":2,\"currency\":\"GBP\"},\"quantity\":1}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    In order to add a new item to a cart, this endpoint should be called. This endpoint will allow the addition of single line items, not bulk.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartReference}/line-items

    POST Parameters
    description
    Description of the line item    		 string Required
    pricing
    Collection of information regarding pricing    		 object
    pricing \ grossAmount
    The gross amount of the line item    		 number Required
    pricing \ netAmount
    The net amount of the line item    		 number Required
    pricing \ taxAmount
    The tax amount of the line item    		 number Required
    pricing \ currency
    Currency of the transaction    		 string Required
    pricing \ priceId
    The pre-configured eSuite price identifier    		 string
    productId
    The pre-configured eSuite product identifier    		 integer
    quantity
    Number of the line item being purchased    		 integer Required
    customLineItemParameters

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    Calling this endpoint will allow you to remove an item from a cart. It will not be possible to remove an line-item from a cart has is deemed immutable due to being involved in a purchase.

    HTTP Request

    DELETE https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/carts/{cartResourceReference}/line-items/{lineItemReference}

    Retrieve an Account’s Cart

    curl --request GET \
--url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/carts/{cartReference} \
--header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
--header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
--header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \

puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/carts/{cartReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/carts/{cartReference}",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    [
    {
        "resourceReference": "0010IP4Y47M3256M51",
        "description": "item description",
        "pricing": {
            "grossAmount": 10.00,
            "netAmount": 8.00,
            "taxAmount": 2.00,
            "currency": "EUR"
        },
        "quantity": 1,
        "productInfo": {},
        "customLineItemParameters": {}
    }
]

    Calling this endpoint will allow for the retrieval of all carts associated to an account. The response will include those associated to a payment instruction and those which are still pending completion.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/carts/{cartIdentifier}

    Response Parameters
    lineItemReference
    Line Item Reference    		 string
    description
    Description of the line item    		 string
    pricing
    Collection of information regarding pricing    		 object
    pricing \ grossAmount
    The gross amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ netAmount
    The net amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ taxAmount
    The tax amount of the line item    		 number
    pricing \ currency
    Currency of the transaction    		 string
    quantity
    Number of the line item being purchased    		 integer
    productInfo
    Collection of Product information    		 object
    productInfo > productId
    The pre-configured product identifier    		 integer
    customLineItemParameters
    Collection of custom line item parameters    		 dictionary
    customLineItemParameters \ parameterName
    Name associated to the custom parameter    		 string

    Payment Instructions

    Create a Payment Instruction

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"cartReference":"A12347853S","paymentMethod":"SEPA","addressReference":"B123678542","voucherCode":"5OFFABCD","fulfilmentInfo":[{"fulfilmentType":"Digital","addressReference":"B123678542GV","fulfilmentDates":["2018-03-01T00:00:00"],"leadTime":4,"associatedPayments":{"paymentDates":["2018-03-01T00:00:00","2018-05-01T00:00:00","2018-05-01T00:00:00"],"customPaymentParameters":{"originator":"DirectSale"}},"customFulfilmentParameters":{"instructions":"Leave in garage."}}],"synchronousPaymentInfo":{"paymentMethod":"CreditCard","customPaymentParameters":null},"customPaymentInstructionParameters":{"paymentType":"pre-paid"}}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"cartReference\":\"A12347853S\",\"paymentMethod\":\"SEPA\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542\",\"voucherCode\":\"5OFFABCD\",\"fulfilmentInfo\":[{\"fulfilmentType\":\"Digital\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542GV\",\"fulfilmentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\"],\"leadTime\":4,\"associatedPayments\":{\"paymentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\"],\"customPaymentParameters\":{\"originator\":\"DirectSale\"}},\"customFulfilmentParameters\":{\"instructions\":\"Leave in garage.\"}}],\"synchronousPaymentInfo\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"customPaymentParameters\":null},\"customPaymentInstructionParameters\":{\"paymentType\":\"pre-paid\"}}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-sessionid", "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"cartReference\":\"A12347853S\",\"paymentMethod\":\"SEPA\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542\",\"voucherCode\":\"5OFFABCD\",\"fulfilmentInfo\":[{\"fulfilmentType\":\"Digital\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542GV\",\"fulfilmentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\"],\"leadTime\":4,\"associatedPayments\":{\"paymentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\"],\"customPaymentParameters\":{\"originator\":\"DirectSale\"}},\"customFulfilmentParameters\":{\"instructions\":\"Leave in garage.\"}}],\"synchronousPaymentInfo\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"customPaymentParameters\":null},\"customPaymentInstructionParameters\":{\"paymentType\":\"pre-paid\"}}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"cartReference\":\"A12347853S\",\"paymentMethod\":\"SEPA\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542\",\"voucherCode\":\"5OFFABCD\",\"fulfilmentInfo\":[{\"fulfilmentType\":\"Digital\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542GV\",\"fulfilmentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\"],\"leadTime\":4,\"associatedPayments\":{\"paymentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\"],\"customPaymentParameters\":{\"originator\":\"DirectSale\"}},\"customFulfilmentParameters\":{\"instructions\":\"Leave in garage.\"}}],\"synchronousPaymentInfo\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"customPaymentParameters\":null},\"customPaymentInstructionParameters\":{\"paymentType\":\"pre-paid\"}}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"cartReference\":\"A12347853S\",\"paymentMethod\":\"SEPA\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542\",\"voucherCode\":\"5OFFABCD\",\"fulfilmentInfo\":[{\"fulfilmentType\":\"Digital\",\"addressReference\":\"B123678542GV\",\"fulfilmentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\"],\"leadTime\":4,\"associatedPayments\":{\"paymentDates\":[\"2018-03-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\",\"2018-05-01T00:00:00\"],\"customPaymentParameters\":{\"originator\":\"DirectSale\"}},\"customFulfilmentParameters\":{\"instructions\":\"Leave in garage.\"}}],\"synchronousPaymentInfo\":{\"paymentMethod\":\"CreditCard\",\"customPaymentParameters\":null},\"customPaymentInstructionParameters\":{\"paymentType\":\"pre-paid\"}}"

headers = { 
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    Not available

    The above command returns a HTTP 201 alongside a response Header of Location.

    This endpoint allows you to create a payment instruction for a specific account.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions

    Request Parameters
    cartReference
    The cart which is default for the payment instruction.    		 string Required
    paymentMethod
    The default payment method for the payment instruction. The available payment methods for this endpoint are: CreditCard, BACS, SEPA and Offline.    		 string Required
    addressReference
    The reference addrress the fulfilments will be delivered to.    		 string Required
    voucherCode
    A discount code generated from eSuite    		 string
    fulfilmentInfo
    Information relating to each fulfilment and associated payments    		 array[objects] Required
    fulfilmentInfo \ fulfilmentType
    The type of fulfilment being purchase. Only physical is available.    		 string
    fulfilmentInfo \ addressReference
    An address reference that will override the top level address    		 string
    fulfilmentInfo \ fulfilmentDates
    The collection of dates the fulfilments will be shipped    		 array[string] Required
    fulfilmentInfo \ leadTime
    The number of days lead time needed by a supplier    		 integer
    fulfilmentInfo \ associatedPayments
    Collection of payments associated to the fulfilment    		 object Required
    associatedPayments \ paymentDates
    The dates at which payment should be taken for the fulfilment    		 array[string] Required
    customPaymentParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the payments.    		 dictionary
    customPaymentParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the payments.    		 string
    customFulfilmentParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the fulfilments.    		 dictionary
    customFulfilmentParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the fulfilment.    		 string
    synchronousPaymentInfo
    An example string    		 object
    synchronousPaymentInfo \ paymentMethod
    The method by which the payment should be made. The available payment methods for synchronous payments are CreditCard and Offline.    		 string Required
    synchronousPaymentInfo \ customPaymentParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the payments.    		 dictionary
    customPaymentParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the payments.    		 string
    customPaymentInstructionParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the payment instructions.    		 dictionary
    customPaymentInstructionParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the payment instruction.    		 string

    Retrieve a Payment Instruction

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference} \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-sessionid": "a0c595bd26004ff4bb7d4cb1b1c81a6d",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"

  "status": "Active",
  "currency": "GBP",
  "cartReference": "0010KCKSYU72H5M3X0",

    {
      "fulfilments": [
        {
          "fulfilmentReference": "0010L00WASCMKX7UO3",

          "paymentStatus": "Pending",
          "dateCreated": "2017-03-20T00:00:00",
          "dateLastUpdated": "2017-03-20T00:00:00",
          "vatAmount": 20,

          "netAmount": 100,

            "Custom Payment Param Name 1": "Custom Payment Param Value 1",
            "Custom Payment Param Name 2": "Custom Payment Param Value 2",
            "Custom Payment Param Name 3": "Custom Payment Param Value 3"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "customPaymentInstructionParameters": {
    "name": "value"
  }
}

    This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific support log, for a specific account.

    URL Endpoint

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}/

    Response Parameters
    paymentInstructionReference
    The identifier for the payment instruction.    		 string
    status
    The status of the payment instruction.    		 string
    currency
    The currency against the payment instruction.    		 string
    cartReference
    The cart which is default for the payment instruction.    		 string
    fulfilmentPaymentMappings
    An array of objects that map payments to their associated fulfilments.    		 array[objects]
    fulfilmentPaymentMappings \ fulfilments
    An array of all fulfilments for the payment instruction.    		 array[objects]
    fulfilments \ fulfilmentReference
    The reference identifier to the fulfilment    		 string
    fulfilments \ fulfilmentStatus
    The status of the fulfilment e.g. pending, processing, dispatched or cancelled.    		 string
    fulfilments \ fulfilmentType
    Indication as to whether it is a digital or physical fulfilment.    		 string
    fulfilments \ expectedDeliveryDate
    The date and time the account expects to receive their goods.    		 string
    fulfilments \ supplierNotificationDate
    The date and time at which eSuite will notify the fulfilment system.    		 string
    fulfilments \ addressReference
    The reference addrress the fulfilment will be delivered to.    		 string
    fulfilments \ dateCreated
    The date and time the fulfilment was created.    		 string
    fulfilments \ dateLastUpdated
    The date and time the fulfilment was last updated.    		 string
    fulfilments \ customFulfilmentParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the fulfilment.    		 dictionary
    customFulfilmentParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the fulfilment.    		 string
    fulfilmentPaymentMappings \ payments
    An array of all payments for the payment instruction.    		 array[objects]
    payments \ paymentReference
    The reference identifier to the fulfilment    		 string
    payments \ paymentDate
    The status of the fulfilment e.g. pending, processing, dispatched or cancelled.    		 string
    payments \ paymentStatus
    Indication as to whether it is a digital or physical fulfilment.    		 string
    payments \ vatAmount
    The amount apportioned to tax.    		 string
    payments \ grossAmount
    The amount charged and submitted to the merchant.    		 string
    payments \ netAmount
    The amount charged minus tax.    		 string
    payments \ dateCreated
    The date and time the payment was created.    		 string
    payments \ dateLastUpdated
    The date and time the payment was last updated.    		 string
    payments \ customPaymentParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the payments.    		 dictionary
    customPaymentParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the payment.    		 string
    customPaymentInstructionParameters
    This is a collection of custom attributes against the payment instructions.    		 dictionary
    customPaymentInstructionParameters \ parameterName
    Representation of all custom parameters against the payment instruction.    		 string

    Update a Payment Instruction

    curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
 --data '[{"op":"replace","path":"/Status","value":"Cancelled"},{"op":"add","path":"/CancellationCode","value":"0.14"},{"op":"add","path":"/CancellationReason","value":"this is a value"}]'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.patch);
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/Status\",\"value\":\"Cancelled\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationCode\",\"value\":\"0.14\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationReason\",\"value\":\"this is a value\"}]", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.patch("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/Status\",\"value\":\"Cancelled\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationCode\",\"value\":\"0.14\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationReason\",\"value\":\"this is a value\"}]")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/Status\",\"value\":\"Cancelled\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationCode\",\"value\":\"0.14\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationReason\",\"value\":\"this is a value\"}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/Status\",\"value\":\"Cancelled\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationCode\",\"value\":\"0.14\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationReason\",\"value\":\"this is a value\"}]"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("PATCH", "/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}",
  "method": "PATCH",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com",
    "content-type": "application/json"
  },
  "processData": false,
  "data": "[{\"op\":\"replace\",\"path\":\"/Status\",\"value\":\"Cancelled\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationCode\",\"value\":\"0.14\"},{\"op\":\"add\",\"path\":\"/CancellationReason\",\"value\":\"this is a value\"}]"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns a HTTP 204:

    In the event you need to update a payment instruction, this end point should be called to edit specific attributes of the payment instructions.

    URL Endpoint

    PATCH https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/{paymentInstructionReference}

    PATCH Parameters
    A collection of updates that should be made to the resource array[objects] Required
    op
    The type of change that should be executed. add, replace and remove are available operations.    		 string Required
    path
    The name of the parameter that should be updated.    		 string Required
    value
    The new value to store against the parameter.    		 string Required

    Retrieve a summary of Payment Instructions

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/summary \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/summary");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/summary")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/accounts/{accountId}/payment-instructions/summary",

    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
