    This endpoint will return you a subset of your configured subscription services, based on the query parameters provided.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/subscriptions/search
    serviceIds
    A collection of subscription service Identifiers    		 array[integer]
    subscriptionGroupTagName
    Subscription service group name    		 string

    Response Parameters
    subscriptionsInfo
    Object containing all subscription services on the Client    		 array[object]
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionId
    The identifier of the subscription    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > resourceReference
    The reference of the subscription    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionGroup
    The subscription group the subscription belongs    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionGroupTag
    The subscription group tag the subscription belongs    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionGroupStatus
    The status of the subscription group    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionDescription
    A description of the subscription service    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionTitle
    A title of the subscription service    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionType
    The type of subscription service    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > subscriptionStatus
    The status of the subscription service    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > initialPricingEnabled
    An indication whether initial pricing is enabled    		 bool
    subscriptionsInfo > trialInfo
    Object containing trial information    		 object
    trialInfo > trialEnabled
    An indication whether trials are enabled    		 bool
    trialInfo > trialUnit
    Duration type (month, day, year, etc.)    		 string
    trialInfo > trialPeriod
    How long the duration should be    		 integer
    trialInfo > discountPercentage
    How much the price will be discounted    		 number
    trialInfo > nonPaymentTrial
    An indication to whether payment details are required    		 bool
    subscriptionsInfo > contractInfo
    Object containing contract information    		 object
    contractInfo > contractUnit
    Type of contract (day, week, month, etc.)    		 string
    contractInfo > contractPeriod
    Number of units the contract runs    		 integer
    contractInfo > autoRenewDefault
    Indication whether the subscription service will renew    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > pricingInfo
    The collection of all prices configured for the subscription service    		 array[object]
    pricingInfo > currency
    The currency the price is associated to    		 string
    pricingInfo > initialPrice
    The price that will be paid on sign-up of the subscription service    		 number
    pricingInfo > priceIsGross
    An indication as to whether the price returned is the gross or net price    		 bool
    pricingInfo > renewalPrice
    The price that will be paid on subsequent renewal purchases    		 number
    pricingInfo > priceId
    The eSuite Identifer for the price    		 integer
    pricingInfo > taxCategory
    Tax category    		 string
    pricingInfo > resourceReference
    The identifier for the price that should be used on purchase calls    		 string
    pricingInfo > paymentMethod
    The payment method associated to the specific price    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > allowedPaymentMethods
    The collection of payment methods available on the subscription service    		 array[string]
    subscriptionsInfo > customParameters
    Custom parameters    		 array[object]
    customParameters > parameterName
    Name of the custom parameter    		 string
    customParameters > parameterType
    An indication as to what data type the parameter should be displayed e.g. HTML, Decimal    		 string
    customParameters > parameterValue
    Value of the custom parameter    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > images
    The overarching object which contains all images for the subscription service    		 array[object]
    images > imageId
    The eSuite identifier for the image    		 integer
    images > displayName
    Display name    		 string
    images > fileName
    The file name associated to the image    		 string
    images > default
    An indication as to whether the image is the default image for the subscription service    		 bool
    images > location
    The URL location the image is hosted at    		 string
    subscriptionsInfo > groupLicensing
    A breakdown of how many group licenses are associated to the subscription service    		 object
    groupLicensing > standard
    The number of standard licenses associated to the subscription service    		 integer
    groupLicensing > overflow
    The number of overflow licenses associated to the subscription service    		 integer

    Retrieve All Products

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/products/", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "products": [
    {
      "productId": 0,
      "status": "Active",
      "title": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "pricing": [
        {
          "currency": "string",
          "purchaseInfo": [
            {
              "paymentMethod": [
                {
                  "grossAmount": 0,
                  "paymentMethod": "CreditDebitCard",
                  "priceId": "string",
                  "resourceReference": "string"
                }
              ],
              "roleInfo": {
                "roleId": "string",
                "clientRef": "string",
                "title": "string"
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "images": [
        {
          "imageId": 0,
          "displayName": "string",
          "fileName": "string",
          "default": true,
          "location": "string"
        }
      ],
      "supplier": {
        "suppliedId": 0,
        "name": "string"
      },
      "type": {
        "typeId": 0,
        "name": "string"
      },
      "customParameters": [
        {
          "parameterName": "string",
          "parameterValue": "string"
        }
      ],
      "resourceReference": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    To return all configured products within your instance of eSuite, this endpoint should be called.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products

    Response Parameters
    products
    List of products    		 array[object]
    products \ productId
    Product identifier    		 integer
    products \ status
    Product status    		 string
    products \ title
    Title    		 string
    products \ description
    Description    		 string
    products \ pricing
    Pricing    		 array[object]
    pricing \ currency
    IsoCode    		 string
    pricing \ purchaseInfo
    Purchase info    		 array[object]
    purchaseInfo \ paymentMethod
    Payment method    		 array[object]
    paymentMethod \ grossAmount
    Gross amount    		 number
    paymentMethod \ paymentMethod
    Payment method    		 string
    paymentMethod \ priceId
    Price id    		 string
    paymentMethod \ resourceReference
    Resource Reference for the PriceId    		 string
    purchaseInfo \ roleInfo
    Pricing role    		 object
    roleInfo \ roleId
    Role identifier    		 string
    roleInfo \ clientRef
    Client reference    		 string
    roleInfo \ title
    Title    		 string
    products \ images
    Images of the product    		 array[object]
    images \ imageId
    Image identifier    		 integer
    images \ displayName
    Display name    		 string
    images \ fileName
    File name    		 string
    images \ default
    Specify if image is default    		 bool
    images \ location
    Path to the image    		 string
    products \ supplier
    Supplier details    		 object
    supplier \ suppliedId
    Supplier identifier    		 integer
    supplier \ name
    Name    		 string
    products \ type
    Product type    		 object
    type \ typeId
    Type id    		 integer
    type \ name
    Type name    		 string
    products \ customParameters
    Custom parameters    		 array[object]
    customParameters \ parameterName
    Name of the custom parameter    		 string
    customParameters \ parameterValue
    Value of the custom parameter    		 string
    products \ resourceReference
    Resource Reference for the ProductId    		 string

    Retrieve Filtered Products

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/products/search", payload)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

    var settings = {
  "async": true,
  "crossDomain": true,
  "url": "https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search",
  "method": "GET",
  "headers": {
    "x-tokenid": "BE52ADA2064C4F9A9D90F28D066D1RFT",
    "x-version": "9.0.0",
    "origin": "https://www.mppglobal.com"
  },
  "data": "{}"
}

$.ajax(settings).done(function (response) {
  console.log(response);
});

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "products": [
    {
      "productId": 0,
      "status": "Active",
      "title": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "pricing": [
        {
          "currency": "string",
          "purchaseInfo": [
            {
              "paymentMethod": [
                {
                  "grossAmount": 0,
                  "paymentMethod": "CreditDebitCard",
                  "priceId": "string",
                  "resourceReference": "string"
                }
              ],
              "roleInfo": {
                "roleId": "string",
                "clientRef": "string",
                "title": "string"
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "images": [
        {
          "imageId": 0,
          "displayName": "string",
          "fileName": "string",
          "default": true,
          "location": "string"
        }
      ],
      "supplier": {
        "suppliedId": 0,
        "name": "string"
      },
      "type": {
        "typeId": 0,
        "name": "string"
      },
      "customParameters": [
        {
          "parameterName": "string",
          "parameterValue": "string"
        }
      ],
      "resourceReference": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    To return only a subset of your product catalogoue, this endpoint should be called with the appropriate query string parameters.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/products/search
    productIds
    A collection of product Identifiers    		 array[integer]
    currency
    The currency prices should be returned    		 string

    Response Parameters
    products
    List of products    		 array[object]
    products \ productId
    Product identifier    		 integer
    products \ status
    Product status    		 string
    products \ title
    Title    		 string
    products \ description
    Description    		 string
    products \ pricing
    Pricing    		 array[object]
    pricing \ currency
    IsoCode    		 string
    pricing \ purchaseInfo
    Purchase info    		 array[object]
    purchaseInfo \ paymentMethod
    Payment method    		 array[object]
    paymentMethod \ grossAmount
    Gross amount    		 number
    paymentMethod \ paymentMethod
    Payment method    		 string
    paymentMethod \ priceId
    Price id    		 string
    paymentMethod \ resourceReference
    Resource Reference for the PriceId    		 string
    products \ pricing > purchaseInfo > roleInfo
    Pricing role    		 object
    roleInfo \ roleId
    Role identifier    		 string
    roleInfo \ clientRef
    Client reference    		 string
    roleInfo \ title
    Title    		 string
    products \ images
    Images of the product    		 array[object]
    images \ imageId
    Image identifier    		 integer
    images \ displayName
    Display name    		 string
    images \ fileName
    File name    		 string
    images \ default
    Specify if image is default    		 bool
    images \ location
    Path to the image    		 string
    products \ supplier
    Supplier details    		 object
    suppliedId
    Supplier identifier    		 integer
    supplier \ name
    Name    		 string
    products \ type
    Product type    		 object
    type \ typeId
    Type id    		 integer
    type \ name
    Type name    		 string
    products \ customParameters
    Custom parameters    		 array[object]
    customParameters \ parameterName
    Name of the custom parameter    		 string
    customParameters \ parameterValue
    Value of the custom parameter    		 string
    products \ resourceReference
    Resource Reference for the ProductId    		 string

    Offers

    Retrieve all Offers

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/offers", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "totalNumberOfRecords": 0,
  "pageNumber": 0,
  "resultsPerPage": 0,
  "items": [
    {
      "offerReference": "string",
      "startDate": "2017-07-27T16:22:18.163Z",
      "expiryDate": "2017-07-27T16:22:18.163Z",
      "name": "string",
      "description": "string",
      "usageType": "UniqueToUserUseOnce",
      "applicationData": {
        "name": "string",
        "message": "string",
        "message2": "string"
      },
      "addCredits": {
        "amount": 0,
        "currency": "string",
        "paymentDetailsRequired": true
      },
      "lowStart": {
        "percentage": 0,
        "numberOfPeriods": 0,
        "lockInPeriods": 0,
        "closeSubOnExpiry": true,
        "serviceIds": [
          0
        ],
        "paymentDetailsRequired": true
      },
      "percentageDiscount": {
        "percentage": 0,
        "paymentDetailsRequired": true
      },
      "freePeriod": {
        "numberOfPeriods": 0,
        "serviceIds": [
          0
        ],
        "paymentDetailsRequired": true
      },
      "groupDiscount": {
        "activationCodeActivated": true,
        "metaData": {
          "qualifyingItemCount": 0,
          "freeItemCountOrDiscountAmount": 0,
          "productIds": [
            0
          ],
          "configurationType": "string",
          "productSource": "string",
          "customParameters": {}
        }
      },
      "fixedPriceDiscount": {
        "discountAmounts": [
          {
            "value": 0,
            "currency": "string"
          }
        ],
        "paymentDetailsRequired": true,
        "subscriptionSettings": {
          "enabled": true,
          "numberOfPeriods": 0,
          "lockInPeriods": 0,
          "closeSubOnExpiry": true,
          "serviceIds": [
            0
          ]
        },
        "productSettings": {
          "enabled": true,
          "productIds": [
            0
          ]
        },
        "miscellaneousChargeSettings": {
          "enabled": true
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Calling this endpoint, will return all configured offers against your instance of eSuite. This endpoint allow you to return a specific number of offers per page and the page number you would like to view. If no additional filters are provided a default 50 page limit will be returned.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers

    GET Parameters
    productReference
    Providing this parameter will return offers specific to this product    		 string
    status
    Indicates whether to return Active or Disabled offers    		 string
    pageNumber
    Which page should be returned    		 integer
    rowsPerPage
    The number of results to return per page    		 integer

    Response Parameters
    totalNumberOfRecords
    The total number of offers found as a result of the request    		 string
    pageNumber
    The page number being displayed    		 string
    resultsPerPage
    The number of records being displayed    		 integer
    items
    Collection of all offers    		 array[objects]
    items \ offerReference
    Unique identifier for the offer    		 string
    items \ startDate
    The date at which the offer becomes active    		 string
    items \ expiryDate
    The date at which the offer becomes inactive    		 string
    items \ name
    The name associated to the offer    		 string
    items \ description
    Additional details against the offer    		 string
    items \ usageType
    The type of usage applicable for the offer    		 string
    items \ applicationData
    Alternative data to display to an end-user    		 array[objects]
    applicationData \ name
    End-user name    		 string
    applicationData \ message
    Public facing message    		 string
    applicationData \ message2
    Additional public facing message    		 string
    items \ addCredits
    Information relating to an AddCredits offer type    		 array[objects]
    addCredits \ amount
    Amount of credit the account should receive    		 decimal
    addCredits \ currency
    Currency the credit should be added in    		 string
    addCredits \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    items \ lowStart
    Information relating to an LowStart offer type    		 array[objects]
    lowStart \ percentage
    The percentage discount the account should receive    		 decimal
    lowStart \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    lowStart \ lockInPeriods
    Number of periods before the account can cancel their subscription    		 integer
    lowStart \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    lowStart \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    lowStart \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    items \ percentageDiscount
    Information relating to an PercentageDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    percentageDiscount \ percentage
    The percentage discount that will be received    		 decimal
    percentageDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    items \ freePeriod
    Information relating to an freePeriod offer type    		 array[objects]
    freePeriod \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    freePeriod \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    freePeriod \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    items \ groupDiscount
    Information relating to an GroupDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    groupDiscount \ metaData
    Metadata of the group discount    		 object
    metaData \ qualifyingItemCount
    The number of items that must be purchased to be applicable for the offer    		 integer
    metaData \ freeItemCountOrDiscountAmount
    The discount amount or the number of free items    		 integer
    metaData \ productIds
    List of Products that can have the offer redeemed    		 array[integer]
    groupDiscount \ productSource
    Product source    		 string
    groupDiscount \ customParameters
    Dictionary of custom parameters applicable to the discount    		 dictionary
    items \ fixedPriceDiscount
    Information relating to an FixedPriceDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    fixedPriceDiscount \ discountAmounts
    Specific currency configuration    		 array[objects]
    discountAmounts \ value
    Amount to be discounted    		 decimal
    discountAmounts \ currency
    The associated currency    		 string
    fixedPriceDiscount \ subscriptionSettings
    Settings associated to the service aspect of a fixed price discount    		 array[objects]
    subscriptionSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a subscription purchase    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ numberOfPeriods
    Number of renewing periods the offer is applicable for    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ lockInPeriods
    The number of periods an account would be locked in if the offer was redeemed    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ productSettings
    Product specific settings for the offer    		 array[objects]
    productSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a product purchase    		 bool
    productSettings \ productIds
    Collection of products that can benefit from the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ miscellaneousChargeSettings
    Details specific to one-off charge    		 object
    miscellaneousChargeSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a one-off charge    		 bool

    Retrieve an Offer

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference} \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    {
  "offerReference": "string",
  "startDate": "2017-07-27T16:22:18.171Z",
  "expiryDate": "2017-07-27T16:22:18.171Z",
  "name": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "usageType": "UniqueToUserUseOnce",
  "applicationData": {
    "name": "string",
    "message": "string",
    "message2": "string"
  },

    "amount": 0,
    "currency": "string",
    "paymentDetailsRequired": true

    "percentage": 0,

    "lockInPeriods": 0,

      0
    ],

      0

      "productIds": [

      "enabled": true
    }
  }

    Calling this endpoint will return a specific instance of an offer.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}

    Response Parameters
    offerReference
    Unique identifier for the offer    		 string
    startDate
    The date at which the offer becomes active    		 string
    expiryDate
    The date at which the offer becomes inactive    		 string
    name
    The name associated to the offer    		 string
    description
    Additional details against the offer    		 string
    usageType
    The type of usage applicable for the offer    		 string
    applicationData
    Alternative data to display to an end-user    		 array[objects]
    applicationData \ name
    End-user name    		 string
    applicationData \ message
    Public facing message    		 string
    applicationData \ message2
    Additional public facing message    		 string
    addCredits
    Information relating to an AddCredits offer type    		 array[objects]
    addCredits \ amount
    Amount of credit the account should receive    		 decimal
    addCredits \ currency
    Currency the credit should be added in    		 string
    addCredits \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    lowStart
    Information relating to an LowStart offer type    		 array[objects]
    lowStart \ percentage
    The percentage discount the account should receive    		 decimal
    lowStart \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    lowStart \ lockInPeriods
    Number of periods before the account can cancel their subscription    		 integer
    lowStart \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    lowStart \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    lowStart \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    percentageDiscount
    Information relating to an PercentageDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    percentageDiscount \ percentage
    The percentage discount that will be received    		 decimal
    percentageDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    freePeriod
    Information relating to an freePeriod offer type    		 array[objects]
    freePeriod \ numberOfPeriods
    How long the discount should take place    		 integer
    freePeriod \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    freePeriod \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    groupDiscount
    Information relating to an GroupDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    groupDiscount \ metaData
    Metadata of the group discount    		 object
    metaData \ qualifyingItemCount
    The number of items that must be purchased to be applicable for the offer    		 integer
    metaData \ freeItemCountOrDiscountAmount
    The discount amount or the number of free items    		 integer
    metaData \ productIds
    List of Products that can have the offer redeemed    		 array[integer]
    groupDiscount \ productSource
    Product source    		 string
    groupDiscount \ customParameters
    Dictionary of custom parameters applicable to the discount    		 dictionary
    fixedPriceDiscount
    Information relating to an FixedPriceDiscount offer type    		 array[objects]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ paymentDetailsRequired
    Indication as to whether the account is required to provide payment information    		 bool
    fixedPriceDiscount \ discountAmounts
    Specific currency configuration    		 array[objects]
    discountAmounts \ value
    Amount to be discounted    		 decimal
    discountAmounts \ currency
    The associated currency    		 string
    fixedPriceDiscount \ subscriptionSettings
    Settings associated to the service aspect of a fixed price discount    		 array[objects]
    subscriptionSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a subscription purchase    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ numberOfPeriods
    Number of renewing periods the offer is applicable for    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ lockInPeriods
    The number of periods an account would be locked in if the offer was redeemed    		 integer
    subscriptionSettings \ closeSubOnExpiry
    Indication whether the subscription will expire at the same time as the offer    		 bool
    subscriptionSettings \ serviceIds
    Collection of applicable services for the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ productSettings
    Product specific settings for the offer    		 array[objects]
    productSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a product purchase    		 bool
    productSettings \ productIds
    Collection of products that can benefit from the offer    		 array[integer]
    fixedPriceDiscount \ miscellaneousChargeSettings
    Details specific to one-off charge    		 object
    miscellaneousChargeSettings \ enabled
    Indication as to whether the offer can be used on a one-off charge    		 bool

    Retrieve all vouchers

    curl --request GET \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    [
    "J964AG3AJA",
    "7G94G3JJ5A",
    "67JAGJAD4G",
    "G7JMGGPPPP"
]

    This endpoint will allow you to retrieve all available voucher codes that are applicable for use.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/offers/{offerReference}/vouchers

    Response Parameters
    List of available voucher codes for the configured offer array[string]

    Analytics

    Retrieve Analytics Data

    curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/analytics/methodName?enddate=2099-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&startdate=2017-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z' \
  --header 'x-clientid: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientpassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --data '{}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/analytics/methodName?enddate=2099-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&startdate=2017-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.GET);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("x-clientid", "1001");
request.AddParameter("undefined", "{}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/analytics/methodName?enddate=2099-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&startdate=2017-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z")
  .header("x-clientid", "1001")
  .header("x-clientpassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .body("{}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/analytics/methodName?enddate=2099-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&startdate=2017-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientpassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{}"

headers = {
    'x-clientid': "1001",
    'x-clientpassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0'
    }

conn.request("GET", "/api/analytics/methodName?enddate=2099-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z&startdate=2017-05-18T00%3A00%3A00.000Z", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

    Unavailable

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    [
  {
    "parameterName": "parameterValue"
  }
]

    This endpoint can be used to extract predefined datasets from eSuite for use in external dashboards.

    HTTP Request

    GET https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/analytics/{method}

    Query string
    startdate
    DateTime (No) for start of query    		 string
    enddate
    DateTime (No) for end of query    		 string
    referencecurrency
    If the method returns a financial information. It is possible to restrict down by currency    		 string
    timezoneoffset
    All data stored in eSuite is stored in UTC. If you require it in your local time, provide your UTC offset e.g. 1    		 integer

    Available Data Sources
    Dynamic_Account_Authentication_Attempts
    Account authentication attempts (per day)
    Dynamic_Authentication_RequestsPerHour
    Account authentication attempts (per hour)
    Dynamic_Accounts_ByStatus
    Account Status
    Dynamic_Accounts_CreatedByDay
    Account creation profile
    Dynamic_Cards_Expiring_Next_Month
    Expiring Cards
    Dynamic_Consumer_Payment_Methods
    Consumer Payment Methods
    Dynamic_CreditDebitCard_Autorisations
    Payment card authorisation attempts
    Dynamic_Most_Redeemed_Offers
    Most redeemed Offers
    Dynamic_NonSubscriptions_RevenueByDay
    None Subscription Revenue (by day)
    Dynamic_NonSubscriptions_RevenueByPaymentType
    None Subscription Revenue (by payment type)
    Dynamic_Payment_Attempts_Per_Period
    Payment Attempts (by period)
    Dynamic_PromotionCodes_ByDay
    Promotion Code redemption (by day)
    Dynamic_PromotionCodes_RedeemedInPeriod
    Promotion Code redemption (by period)
    Dynamic_Revenue_AllByDay
    All revenue generated per day
    Dynamic_RPM_GetCountOfApiMethods
    API Method Count
    Dynamic_RPM_GetTop50Minutes
    Top RPM Count
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ActiveByDay
    Active Subscription (by day)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ActiveByServiceId
    Active Subscription (by Subscription Service)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_Added
    Subscriptions added
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ChurnbyMonth
    Subscription Churn (by month)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ChurnByReason
    ubscription Churn (by reason)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ChurnByService
    Subscription Churn (by Subscription Service)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ChurnPredictionPrecisionV5LastMonth
    Churn Prediction Precision (previous month)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_ChurnPredictionPrecisionV5ThisMonth
    Churn Prediction Precision (current month)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_RevenueByDay
    Subscription revenue (by day)
    Dynamic_Subscriptions_RevenueByPaymentType
    Subscription revenue (by payment type)
    Dynamic_Top_Subscription_Types
    Top performing Subscriptions
    Dynamic_Voucher_Codes_Redeemed_Per_Period
    Voucher redemption
    RPM_Core_Get
    eSuite Core API Requests (per minute)

    Bulk Actions

    Create Access

    curl --request POST \
  --url https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/bulk/entitlements \
  --header 'x-clientId: 1001' \
  --header 'x-clientPassword: Str0ngP@ssword' \
  --header 'x-version: 9.0.0' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"entitlementIdentifier":"specific-access","startDate":"2017-07-03T11:31:41.0353603Z","endDate":"2017-07-13T11:31:41.0353603Z","accountIds":[123456,123457,123458],"clientUserIds":["A123456","A123457","A123458"]}'

    var client = new RestClient("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/bulk/entitlements");
var request = new RestRequest(Method.POST);
request.AddHeader("x-version", "9.0.0");
request.AddHeader("x-clientId", "1001");
request.AddHeader("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword");
request.AddHeader("content-type", "application/json");
request.AddParameter("application/json", "{\"entitlementIdentifier\":\"specific-access\",\"startDate\":\"2017-07-03T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-13T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"accountIds\":[123456,123457,123458],\"clientUserIds\":[\"A123456\",\"A123457\",\"A123458\"]}", ParameterType.RequestBody);
IRestResponse response = client.Execute(request);

    HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/bulk/entitlements")
  .header("x-clientId", "1001")
  .header("x-clientPassword", "Str0ngP@ssword")
  .header("x-version", "9.0.0")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"entitlementIdentifier\":\"specific-access\",\"startDate\":\"2017-07-03T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-13T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"accountIds\":[123456,123457,123458],\"clientUserIds\":[\"A123456\",\"A123457\",\"A123458\"]}")
  .asString();

    require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://uat.mppglobal.com/api/bulk/entitlements")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["x-clientid"] = '1001'
request["x-clientPassword"] = 'Str0ngP@ssword'
request["x-version"] = '9.0.0'
request.body = "{\"entitlementIdentifier\":\"specific-access\",\"startDate\":\"2017-07-03T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-13T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"accountIds\":[123456,123457,123458],\"clientUserIds\":[\"A123456\",\"A123457\",\"A123458\"]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

    import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("uat.mppglobal.com")

payload = "{\"entitlementIdentifier\":\"specific-access\",\"startDate\":\"2017-07-03T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"endDate\":\"2017-07-13T11:31:41.0353603Z\",\"accountIds\":[123456,123457,123458],\"clientUserIds\":[\"A123456\",\"A123457\",\"A123458\"]}"

headers = { 
     'x-clientid' : '1001',
    'x-clientPassword': "Str0ngP@ssword",
    'x-version': '9.0.0',
    'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/bulk/entitlements", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()


    Not available

    The above command returns a HTTP 204 upon success:

    This endpoint is available to allow you to bulk create access for multiple accounts in a single request.

    HTTP Request

    POST https://uat.mppglobal.com/bulk/entitlements/

    Request Parameters
    entitlementIdentifier
    The access the account should given    		 string Required
    startDate
    The date at which the access should become active    		 dateTime Required
    endDate
    The date at which access to the content should be deactivated.    		 dateTime Required
    accountIds
    A collection of all accounts that should have access given, based upon accountId.    		 array[integer]
    clientUserIds
    A collection of all accounts that should have access given, based upon ClientUserId    		 array[string]
    It is required that either an array of accountIds or clientUserIds must be passed but it is not required to pass both.

    Errors

    In the event an error occurs, an object will be returned:

    {
  "result" : {
      "status" : "FAILED",
      "reason" : "Example String"
  }
}
    This error section is a summary of the possible error codes you could receive from the eSuite API. The API will return a specific error message alongside one of these codes to detail the specific error that has occurred.
    400 Bad Request
    Your request is malformed in some way
    401 Unauthorized
    The API key provided is not valid
    403 Forbidden
    The resource is not accessible using the provided API key
    404 Not Found
    The specified resource could not be found
    405 Method Not Allowed
    You tried to access a resource with an invalid method
    406 Not Acceptable
    You requested a format that isn’t JSON
    412 Pre-Condition Failed
    The request has failed basic validation
    500 Internal Server Error
    We had a problem with our server. Try again later.
    503 Service Unavailable
    a service required to complete the requested operation is unavailable at present. Please try again later.
    cURL C# Java Ruby Python jQuery
